item.title: .echo Hello World
item.description:
Why?

The main purpose of this blog is to provide a space where I can share background information for my presentation at BlackHat Asia 2025. Since I’m not particularly fond of Medium.com or other online publishing platforms, I decided to create my own—so here we are!

Does that mean this blog will focus solely on your BlackHat presentation?

No. This blog will be a platform to share anything that piques my interest, and whenever I come across something worth discussing, I’ll post about it here. There is a high chance it will be something related to the windows kernel, vulnerability research or exploitation in general.

When will you start releasing your blogposts?

Once I receive the green light from BlackHat, I estimate it’ll be around two or three weeks after the event.

…so stay tuned for updates—there’s more to come!
